name: Chess Knights: Eldritch Hunter
description:
Choose your hero and enter the dungeon in this otherworldly puzzle game.
Chess Knights: Eldritch Hunter is an original turn-based puzzle game inspired by Chess.

Featuring:
- All pieces move like in a chess game. You play as a Hero Knight who needs enter the dungeon and solve several puzzles to defeat an otherworldly evil;
- 23 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity (more to come soon!).
- Enter the dungeons and feel the horror in this uncannily beautiful puzzle game;
- Originally composed soundtracks;
- A chess game without any chess. This is an original game concept for chess lovers and newcomers alike (you do not need to know any chess to play it).

Choose your hero and enter the dungeon in this otherworldly puzzle game.
